author: Silvana Franco
method: Place the orange rind and juice in a large bowl and stir in the sugar, honey, cayenne, ginger and salt.  Add the wings, cover and chill for an hour or two, turning from time to time. Set on a rack and roast at 200C/400F/Gas 6 for 25 minutes or barbecue until cooked through and nicely browned.
ingredients: 1 orange, grated rind and juice only,  1 tbsp dark muscovado sugar,  1 tbsp clear honey,  1 tsp cayenne,  1 tsp ground ginger,  Â¼ tsp salt,  12 large chicken wings
